General.Name: IHQ Inc
General.Description: IHQ Inc. operates as an entertainment company in Korea. It produces content in various fields, such as drama, entertainment, and record. The company is also involved in the star management activities; and operation of Comedy TV and Cube TV.IHQ Inc. was founded in 1962 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. IHQ Inc. operates as a subsidiary of KH Media Co., Ltd.

0.Name: Mr. Yong-Joo  Jeon
